detectors.description:

	- feeAddress.transfer(fee) (shared/bad_randomness/etheraffle/etheraffle_3round.sol#95)

detectors.description: Ethraffle_v4b.chooseWinner() (shared/bad_randomness/etheraffle/etheraffle_3round.sol#83-96) uses a weak PRNG: "winningNumber = uint256(keccak256()(block.timestamp,block.difficulty)) % totalTickets (shared/bad_randomness/etheraffle/etheraffle_3round.sol#86)"

Ethraffle_v4b.buyTickets() (shared/bad_randomness/etheraffle/etheraffle_3round.sol#52-81) has costly operations inside a loop:
